verbose_text: Herein we demonstrate that elevation of local levels of NGF within the knee joint significantly facilitates knee joint extension evoked responses of spinal neurones and increases the receptive field size of spinal neurones innervating the knee joint in the MIA model of OA pain, to a greater extent than in naive or control rats.
evidence: NGF within the knee joint significantly facilitates knee joint extension-evoked responses of spinal neurones and increases the receptive field size of spinal neurones innervating the knee joint in the MIA
